scripts.init: lerna clean && lerna bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.prebuild: lerna bootstrap && lerna exec -- mkdir -p build/ && mkdir -p packages/dictionary/build/data && cp packages/dictionary/data/* packages/dictionary/build/data/
scripts.build: npm run build-es6 && npm run build-es5 && npm run dist && npm run docs
scripts.build-es6: lerna exec -- buble --no modules index.js -o build/es6.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build && npm run dist && npm run docs && cp README.md ./packages/tonal/
scripts.api: rm docs/API.md && cat packages/note/README.md packages/interval/README.md packages/distance/README.md packages/scale/README.md packages/chord/README.md packages/pcset/README.md packages/key/README.md > docs/API.md
